des: "Using only fresh herbs and spices, make your own healthy version of onion soup mix from scratch to have on hand for your favorite dishes. Two tablespoons of this mix is the same amount as the store-bought packets."
ins: Place minced onion, parsley, coconut sugar, onion powder, turmeric, sea salt, celery salt, and black pepper in a pint-size mason jar. Cover jar and shake until combined.
